lst.name: sentence
lst.str: El Paso Electric said the agreement allows recovery in its New Mexico rates of lease payments in connection with the utility's 1986 sale and leaseback of its investment in Palo Verde Unit Two to the extent of the book value sold.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: El Paso Electric said it reached a stipulated settlement on its New Mexico rates with several parties, including the state of the New Mexico Public Service Commission, which provides for rate treatment of the utility's investment in the Palo Verde Nuclear Generating Station located near Phoenix, Ariz.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In January the company filed a formal rate case with New Mexico regulators seeking a 21.66 pct increase in its annual rates there which would have been equal to about 13.9 mln dlrs net of fuel savings.
